channel.title: Blackpkz development team,recruiting!WE NEED YOU!hoster gets co-owner
channel.description:
Funscap3
hey,im si force,and i decided to create a server, im currently looking for the following:
forum staff.(5) in-game admins(3) in-game mods(3) coders(3)must be experienced! server hoster,must be able to host between 24/7 or 15/7 also looking for website designers.
will be posting pictures soon,
heres the application part:
job wanted: will you be active on forums,and in-game: how long can you come on for: experience in job: proof:
thats the application, the hoster automatically gets co-owner position on the server, the 2nd owner has alrdy been assigned
current staff:
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
